DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate change active bladder symptom score ( OABSS ) , solifenacin treatment OAB subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Response Over Active Bladder Symptom Score Solifenacin Treatment
DOC.criteria: Symptoms OAB 3 month longer At least 1 urgency episode last 3 day Symptoms OAB verify screen 3day bladder diary , define : . Number micturition ≥8 times/day b . Number urgency episode 3 day ≥3 Significant stress incontinence mixed stress/urge incontinence Subject indwell catheter practice intermittent selfcatheterization Symptomatic urinary tract infection , chronic inflammation Diabetic neuropathy Subjects prohibit take solifenacin contraindication Drug nondrug treatment OAB start , quit change 4 week Participation clinical trial 30 day except Part1 RESORT Diabetic neuropathy
